trans-unit.source: Represents the standard parameters for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 表示用於 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 演算法的標準參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> class exposes an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ExportParameters%2A> method that enables you to retrieve the raw RSA key in the form of an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters> structure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>類別會公開<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ExportParameters%2A>方法可讓您擷取原始的 RSA 金鑰的形式<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters>結構。

trans-unit.source: Understanding the contents of this structure requires familiarity with how the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm works.
trans-unit.target: 了解此結構的內容，必須熟悉如何<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>演算法的運作。

trans-unit.source: The next section discusses the algorithm briefly.
trans-unit.target: 下一節簡要討論的演算法。

trans-unit.source: RSA Algorithm
trans-unit.target: RSA 演算法

trans-unit.source: To generate a key pair, you start by creating two large prime numbers named p and q.
trans-unit.target: 若要產生的金鑰組，您開始建立名為 p 和 q 的兩個大型主要數。

trans-unit.source: These numbers are multiplied and the result is called n.
trans-unit.target: 這些數字相乘，而結果則稱為 n。

trans-unit.source: Because p and q are both prime numbers, the only factors of n are 1, p, q, and n.
trans-unit.target: 因為 p 和 q 這兩個質數，唯一的因素的 n 是 1、 p、 q 和 n。

trans-unit.source: If we consider only numbers that are less than n, the count of numbers that are relatively prime to n, that is, have no factors in common with n, equals (p - 1)(q - 1).
trans-unit.target: 如果我們將只會低於 n 的數字，也就是 n，相對質數的數字計數有沒有因素通用為 n，等於 (p-1)(q-1)。

trans-unit.source: Now you choose a number e, which is relatively prime to the value you calculated.
trans-unit.target: 現在您選擇的數字 e，這是您所計算的值相對質數。

trans-unit.source: The public key is now represented as {e, n}.
trans-unit.target: 公用金鑰現在被以 {e、 n}。

trans-unit.source: To create the private key, you must calculate d, which is a number such that (d)(e) mod (p - 1)(q - 1) = 1.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的私密金鑰，您必須計算 d，這是一個數字的 (d)(e) mod (p-1)(q-1) = 1。

trans-unit.source: In accordance with the Euclidean algorithm, the private key is now {d, n}.
trans-unit.target: 歐幾里德演算法，根據私密金鑰，則現在 {d，n}。

trans-unit.source: Encryption of plaintext m to ciphertext c is defined as c = (m ^ e) mod n.
trans-unit.target: 加密為加密文字 c 的純文字 m 的定義為 c = (m ^ e) mod n。

trans-unit.source: Decryption would then be defined as m = (c ^ d) mod n.
trans-unit.target: 解密然後都會定義為 m = (c ^ d) mod n。

trans-unit.source: Summary of Fields
trans-unit.target: 欄位的摘要

trans-unit.source: Section A.1.2 of the [PKCS #1: RSA Cryptography Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=113155) on the RSA Laboratories Web site defines a format for RSA private keys.
trans-unit.target: 區段的 A.1.2 [PKCS #1: RSA 密碼編譯標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=113155)在 RSA Laboratories 網站上站台定義 RSA 私密金鑰的格式。

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes the fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下表摘要說明的欄位<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters>結構。

trans-unit.source: The third column provides the corresponding field in section A.1.2 of [PKCS #1: RSA Cryptography Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=113155).
trans-unit.target: 第三個資料行提供 A.1.2 區段中的對應欄位的[PKCS #1: RSA 密碼編譯標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=113155)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters> field
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters> 欄位

trans-unit.source: Contains
trans-unit.target: 包含

trans-unit.source: Corresponding PKCS #1 field
trans-unit.target: 對應的 PKCS #1 欄位

trans-unit.source: d, the private exponent
trans-unit.target: d、 私用的指數

trans-unit.source: privateExponent
trans-unit.target: privateExponent

trans-unit.source: d mod (p - 1)
trans-unit.target: d mod (p-1)

trans-unit.source: exponent1
trans-unit.target: exponent1

trans-unit.source: d mod (q - 1)
trans-unit.target: d mod (q-1)

trans-unit.source: exponent2
trans-unit.target: exponent2

trans-unit.source: e, the public exponent
trans-unit.target: e，公開的指數

trans-unit.source: publicExponent
trans-unit.target: publicExponent

trans-unit.source: (InverseQ)(q) = 1 mod p
trans-unit.target: (InverseQ)（問:） = 1 mod p

trans-unit.source: coefficient
trans-unit.target: 係數

trans-unit.source: n
trans-unit.target: n

trans-unit.source: modulus
trans-unit.target: 模數

trans-unit.source: p
trans-unit.target: p

trans-unit.source: prime1
trans-unit.target: prime1

trans-unit.source: q
trans-unit.target: q

trans-unit.source: prime2
trans-unit.target: prime2

trans-unit.source: The security of RSA derives from the fact that, given the public key { e, n }, it is computationally infeasible to calculate d, either directly or by factoring n into p and q.
trans-unit.target: RSA 安全性衍生自事實，指定公開金鑰 {e、 n}，它是直接或 if-then-throw p 和 q n 計算 d，無法建立。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, any part of the key related to d, p, or q must be kept secret.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須與 d、 p、 或問與相關的索引任何的鍵部分保持為機密。

trans-unit.source: If you call
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters%2A> and ask for only the public key information, this is why you will receive only <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters.Exponent> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters.Modulus>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters%2A> 要求只將公用金鑰資訊，這就是為什麼您將會只收到<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters.Exponent>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters.Modulus>。

trans-unit.source: The other fields are available only if you have access to the private key, and you request it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取的私用的索引鍵，並要求時，才可以使用其他欄位。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters> is not encrypted in any way, so you must be careful when you use it with the private key information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters> 不會加密以任何方式，所以您必須謹慎使用私用的索引鍵資訊時。

trans-unit.source: In fact, none of the fields that contain private key information can be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 事實上，包含私人金鑰資訊的欄位中無一可以進行序列化。

trans-unit.source: If you try to serialize an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters> structure with a remoting call or by using one of the serializers, you will receive only public key information.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試序列化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters>結構進行遠端處理呼叫，或使用其中一種序列化程式，您會收到公開金鑰的金鑰資訊。

trans-unit.source: If you want to pass private key information, you will have to manually send that data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要私用金鑰的資訊傳遞時，您必須手動將該資料傳送。

trans-unit.source: In all cases, if anyone can derive the parameters, the key that you transmit becomes useless.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下，任何人都可以衍生參數，如果您傳送的索引鍵會變成無效。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="D" /> parameter for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 表示用於 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 演算法的 <see langword="D" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="DP" /> parameter for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 表示用於 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 演算法的 <see langword="DP" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="DQ" /> parameter for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 表示用於 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 演算法的 <see langword="DQ" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="Exponent" /> parameter for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 表示用於 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 演算法的 <see langword="Exponent" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="InverseQ" /> parameter for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 表示用於 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 演算法的 <see langword="InverseQ" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="Modulus" /> parameter for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 表示用於 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 演算法的 <see langword="Modulus" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="P" /> parameter for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 表示用於 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 演算法的 <see langword="P" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="Q" /> parameter for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 表示用於 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 演算法的 <see langword="Q" /> 參數。
